languages.text: Благодаря порядку, царящему в колонии, культ смерти не поверг ее в кровавую анархию, но стал жесткой арматурой в общей конструкции. В кровавых расправах рождаются беспощадность и жертвенность, нужные Империуму.

Owing to the prevailing vitality of law and order in the colony, the death cult was unable to bring about bloody anarchy but instead became just another callous cog in its vast oppressive machinery. Such gruesome slaughter fosters ruthlessness and a willingness to sacrifice, qualities for which the Imperium has great need.
languages.original_text: Благодаря порядку, царящему в колонии, культ смерти не поверг ее в кровавую анархию, но стал жесткой арматурой в общей конструкции. В кровавых расправах рождаются беспощадность и жертвенность, нужные Империуму.

traits.locale_text: Thanks to the order within the colony, the death cult did not cast it into bloody anarchy but instead became a pillar within its structure. The bloody killings foster ruthlessness and willingness to sacrifice, and the Imperium has need of such qualities.

Thanks to the order within the colony, the death cult did not cast it into bloody anarchy but instead became a pillar within its structure. The bloody killings foster ruthlessness and willingness to sacrifice, and the Imperium has need of such qualities.

Owing to the prevailing vitality of law and order in the colony, the death cult was unable to bring about bloody anarchy but instead became just another callous cog in its vast oppressive machinery. Such gruesome slaughter fosters ruthlessness and a willingness to sacrifice, qualities for which the Imperium has great need.

Owing to the prevailing vitality of law and order in the colony, the death cult was unable to bring about bloody anarchy but instead became just another callous cog in its vast oppressive machinery. Such gruesome slaughter fosters ruthlessness and a willingness to sacrifice, qualities for which the Imperium has great need.

Owing to the prevailing vitality of law and order in the colony, the death cult was unable to bring about bloody anarchy but instead became just another callous cog in its vast oppressive machinery. Such gruesome slaughter fosters ruthlessness and a willingness to sacrifice, qualities for which the Imperium has great need.

languages.text: Dada la fuerza de la ley y el orden en la colonia, el Culto de la Muerte no ha podido traer una sangrienta anarquía sino que se ha convertido en un engranaje más de la maquinaria opresora. Las truculentas masacres fomentan un carácter despiadado dispuesto a hacer toda clase de sacrificios, algo que el Imperium necesita.
languages.original_text: Owing to the prevailing vitality of law and order in the colony, the death cult was unable to bring about bloody anarchy but instead became just another callous cog in its vast oppressive machinery. Such gruesome slaughter fosters ruthlessness and a willingness to sacrifice, qualities for which the Imperium has great need.

traits.locale_text: Dada la fuerza de la ley y el orden en la colonia, el Culto de la Muerte no ha podido traer una sangrienta anarquía sino que se ha convertido en un engranaje más de la maquinaria opresora. Las truculentas masacres fomentan un carácter despiadado dispuesto a hacer toda clase de sacrificios, algo que el Imperium necesita.

languages.text: Grâce aux efforts de la colonie pour faire régner la loi et l'ordre en son sein, le culte de la mort n'a jamais vraiment réussi à faire régner l'anarchie et le chaos, bien au contraire : il fait maintenant partie intégrante de l'impitoyable appareil répressif de la planète. Les adorateurs du massacre qui le composent sont impitoyables et prêts à sacrifier leur vie, des qualités plus que jamais précieuses au sein de l'Imperium.
languages.original_text: Owing to the prevailing vitality of law and order in the colony, the death cult was unable to bring about bloody anarchy but instead became just another callous cog in its vast oppressive machinery. Such gruesome slaughter fosters ruthlessness and a willingness to sacrifice, qualities for which the Imperium has great need.

traits.locale_text: Grâce aux efforts de la colonie pour faire régner la loi et l'ordre en son sein, le culte de la mort n'a jamais vraiment réussi à faire régner l'anarchie et le chaos, bien au contraire : il fait maintenant partie intégrante de l'impitoyable appareil répressif de la planète. Les adorateurs du massacre qui le composent sont impitoyables et prêts à sacrifier leur vie, des qualités plus que jamais précieuses au sein de l'Imperium.

languages.text: 在殖民地政府严格的法律管制下，死亡教派并没有推翻政府，也没有造成血腥的混乱，而是沦为高压统治机器中另一颗无情的齿轮。残忍的杀戮培养了殖民地人民视死如归的冷酷心性，这正是帝国最迫切希望他们具备的品质。
languages.original_text: Owing to the prevailing vitality of law and order in the colony, the death cult was unable to bring about bloody anarchy but instead became just another callous cog in its vast oppressive machinery. Such gruesome slaughter fosters ruthlessness and a willingness to sacrifice, qualities for which the Imperium has great need.

traits.locale_text: 在殖民地政府严格的法律管制下，死亡教派并没有推翻政府，也没有造成血腥的混乱，而是沦为高压统治机器中另一颗无情的齿轮。残忍的杀戮培养了殖民地人民视死如归的冷酷心性，这正是帝国最迫切希望他们具备的品质。

languages.text: コロニーには法と秩序がある。それゆえに、死のカルトは血に塗れた無政府状態をもたらすことはできなかったが、その代わりに巨大な抑圧機械の無慈悲な歯車のひとつとなった。このような陰惨な殺戮こそが、冷酷さと犠牲を厭わないという、帝国が大いに必要とする資質を育むのだ。
languages.original_text: Owing to the prevailing vitality of law and order in the colony, the death cult was unable to bring about bloody anarchy but instead became just another callous cog in its vast oppressive machinery. Such gruesome slaughter fosters ruthlessness and a willingness to sacrifice, qualities for which the Imperium has great need.

traits.locale_text: コロニーには法と秩序がある。それゆえに、死のカルトは血に塗れた無政府状態をもたらすことはできなかったが、その代わりに巨大な抑圧機械の無慈悲な歯車のひとつとなった。このような陰惨な殺戮こそが、冷酷さと犠牲を厭わないという、帝国が大いに必要とする資質を育むのだ。

languages.text: Angesichts der Tatsache, dass in der Kolonie Gesetz und Ordnung sehr stabil vorherrschen, konnte der Todeskult keine blutige Anarchie herbeiführen. Er wurde stattdessen einfach zu einem von vielen kruden Zahnrädern in der gewaltigen oppressiven Maschinerie. Solch grausames Gemetzel fördert skrupelloses Verhalten und die Bereitschaft zur Selbstaufopferung — Eigenschaften, welche das Imperium dringend benötigt.
languages.original_text: Owing to the prevailing vitality of law and order in the colony, the death cult was unable to bring about bloody anarchy but instead became just another callous cog in its vast oppressive machinery. Such gruesome slaughter fosters ruthlessness and a willingness to sacrifice, qualities for which the Imperium has great need.

languages.text: Kanun ve düzenin üstünlüğü sebebiyle kanlı galeyana sebebiyet veremeyen ölüm tarikatı, koloni denen bu dev ve zalim makinenin bünyesinde kayıtsız bir başka dişli olmaktan kaçınamadı. Böylesi feci katliamlar, İmparatorluk'un hayli ihtiyaç duyduğu acımasızlık ve fedakârlık gibi erdemlerin filizlenmesine katkı sağlıyor.
languages.original_text: Owing to the prevailing vitality of law and order in the colony, the death cult was unable to bring about bloody anarchy but instead became just another callous cog in its vast oppressive machinery. Such gruesome slaughter fosters ruthlessness and a willingness to sacrifice, qualities for which the Imperium has great need.
